entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers and periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
